article_title: Tennis Star To Appear At Huether Family Match Pointe Grand Opening
article_text:
Sioux Falls, SD

The Huether Family Match Pointe Tennis Facility has been up and running, but now a tennis star will help break in the new building.

James Blake, who is the former top American Tennis player, will be at the grand opening on April 25th. The public can get a tour of the six-court facility, as well as meet Blake. Players between the ages of 11-18 can also take part in a clinic lead by the tennis standout.

"It's really kind of an exciting opportunity for Sioux Falls to rub shoulders with a professional tennis player," Citibank Senior Vice President of Public Relations Jerry Nachtigal said.
